import React, { useState } from 'react' import style from "./Login.module.css" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export const Login = () => { const [login, setLogin] = useState(true) const changeLoginForm = () => { setLogin(!login); } return (

{login?'Login':'Register'}

{login?(Forgot Password?):''}

{login?"Don't have an account?":"You already have an account?"}

) }
